Subskills.name: Explosive Containers
Subskills.description: Increases the amount of spawned barrels.

Subskills.name: Barrel Blast Radius
Subskills.description: Increases explosion area of effect radius of explosive barrel.

Subskills.name: Bring the Grog
Subskills.description: Barrels are now big and leave the ground burning with increased blast radius.

Subskills.name: Inflammable Liquid
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt to burning targets.

Subskills.name: Scatter Barrel
Subskills.description: Chance on cast to unleash an additional barrel.

Subskills.name: Sudden Dynamite
Subskills.description: Chance on exploding to launch shrapnel around dealing additional damage.

Subskills.name: Stack of Explosives
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt by barrels.

Subskills.name: MORE BARRELS
Subskills.description: Increases proc rate of explosive barrel.

Subskills.name: Circle of TNT
Subskills.description: Now creates a circle of barrels around the target.

Subskills.name: Deepfrozen Barrel
Subskills.description: Dealing cold damage with explosive barrel freezes enemies and inflicts permafrost.

Subskills.name: Barrels of the Freljord
Subskills.description: Barrels now explode in a frigid blast converting damage dealt to cold inflicting cold break.

Subskills.name: Field of Explosives
Subskills.description: Create multiple trails of smaller barrels.

Subskills.name: Explosive Collision
Subskills.description: Now throw a barrel bouncing and exploding multiple times.
